message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth at least that much to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. Is that something we can work with?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $750,000 is just too low.  How about we meet in the middle at $850,000? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $800,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
